A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was hesitant when The Force Awakens came out. I had high hopes for this movie. And I was utterly disappointed.

To begin with... no light saber fights. This renders it to a not Star Wars movie already.

Second: If I buy a ticket I want to be entertained\, I am not interested in the makers or studios political opinion.

Third Un-needed slapstick comedy.

Fourth: The movie was just badly written\, badly directed and just was about ruining J.J. Abrams's achievements. Probably out of hurt pride.

This basically is the death star with Mickey Mouse ears.

Thanks Disney fr taking a dump on my childhood. I will never ever watch anything from you ever again.
